lines.text: [Ossie and Jack are in a diner getting breakfast, and after the waitress brings them their food, Ossie knocks the salt shaker over, spilling the salt]
[Ossie starts pouring the salt over his left shoulder, dumping it on Pancho, who is sitting right next to him]
[Pancho points to the salt on his shoulder]
Monday - Jack flirted with waitress. Knows a good dish when he sees one. Period.
[Pancho and Ossie are in a heated argument]
If I were not in a hurry, I would wait outside!
